summary: On his way to becoming an immortal demon, a gang leader orchestrates the murder of an ex-con and his girlfriend.
cast: Yuji Okumoto|Marcus Chong|Tito Ortiz|Tara Reid|David Boreanaz|Rosemberg Salgado|Edward Furlong|Emmanuelle Chriqui|Danny Trejo|Dave Baez|Ryan Smith|Daymond John|Richard Cumba|Kristina Santoro|Kelsey Daniels|Ashley Christensen|Rena Owen|David Lea|Jorge Jimenez|Gil Medina|Marty Fresca|Macy Gray|Dennis Hopper|Vanessa Sorensen|Liz Katz|Candace Rea|Erin Balentine|Marsha Clark|Barby Garcia
keywords: repeat sequel|killing an animal|offscreen murder|murder of a pregnant woman|tragic event
title: El Cuervo 4: La plegaria maldita
